com.konakart.app

Class Promotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.app.Promotion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PromotionIf

    public class Promotion
extends java.lang.Object
implements PromotionIf
    This is the Promotion class - it contains information about the promotion; links it to the Order Total module that is used to calculate the promotion, and identifies to what products and customers the promotion applies.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        Set to true if the promotion is active.
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface PromotionIf
        Returns:

      • getStatus

        public boolean getStatus(java.util.Date storeTime)
        Returns the status of the object. In order to calculate whether the promotion is active, the following are used:
        • The start and end dates which are compared to the current store time
        • The number of times the promotion has been used
        • The active attribute of the promotion (e.g. isActive()). If this is false then by default the promotion is not active.
        Parameters:
        storeTime - The current storeTime which is used to compare with the start and end dates of the promotion. If null then the standard time of the server is used.
        Returns:
        Returns the status of the object.

      • setActive

        Parameters:
        active - The active to set.

      • isCumulative

        public boolean isCumulative()
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        Set to true if the promotion is cumulative with other promotions. If it isn't cumulative but more than one promotion could apply to the order, then the promotion giving the maximum discount is used.
        Specified by:
        isCumulative in interface PromotionIf
        Returns:
        Returns the cumulative.

      • setCumulative

        public void setCumulative(boolean cumulative)
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf

        Specified by:
        setCumulative in interface PromotionIf
        Parameters:
        cumulative - The cumulative to set.

      • getCategoryRule

        public int getCategoryRule()
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        This is the rule linking categories to the promotion. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.ALL - Include all categories
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some categories
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some categories
        Specified by:
        getCategoryRule in interface PromotionIf
        Returns:
        Returns the categoryRule.

      • getIncludedProducts

        public ProductIf[] getIncludedProducts()
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        An array of products that the promotion includes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion only applies to products in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Specified by:
        getIncludedProducts in interface PromotionIf
        Returns:
        the includedProducts

      • setIncludedProducts

        public void setIncludedProducts(ProductIf[] includedProducts)
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        An array of products that the promotion includes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion only applies to products in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Specified by:
        setIncludedProducts in interface PromotionIf
        Parameters:
        includedProducts - the includedProducts to set

      • getExcludedProducts

        public ProductIf[] getExcludedProducts()
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        An array of products that the promotion excludes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion applies to all products except for the ones in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Specified by:
        getExcludedProducts in interface PromotionIf
        Returns:
        the excludedProducts

      • setExcludedProducts

        public void setExcludedProducts(ProductIf[] excludedProducts)
        Description copied from interface: PromotionIf
        An array of products that the promotion excludes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion applies to all products except for the ones in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Specified by:
        setExcludedProducts in interface PromotionIf
        Parameters:
        excludedProducts - the excludedProducts to set
